reviews.review_msg: Dr. Clapps lectures made the material digestible. He is very knowledgeable and this gives him a great lecture style! His assignments are an expected workload and he makes what he wants very clear. His grading was quite fair and he gives plenty of comments and feedback. Dr. Clapp was also very accommodating and available when help was needed.

Excellent journal readings, writing feedback, interactive projects, and fair-minded way of presenting information. Lectures a bit of a laundry listing, but do show meaningful interrelationships, conflicts and issues.
Thought this class would be very interesting, but ended up being somewhat interesting. Personally didn't like his teaching style and the assignments. It is a "W"-course so expect the work load.
